title: I Feel Like It!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Wow, so this is one of those trendy Tokyo cafés~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Chika-chan, why are you whispering so quietly?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh? Well...... for some reason, it’s really echoey in here..... There also aren’t many people chatting with each other loudly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I don’t think you have to be that self-conscious...... Ah, there they are. Here, Chika-chan, your coffee.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Thank you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>......Chika-chan, are you not gonna add any sugar or milk?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah, since you coordinated such a mature-looking outfit for me today, I thought I’d drink it like this~ Foo, foo...... Sip. ......Ugh.... uhh......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Look, Chika-chan. This is called beet sugar. It has a gentle, sweet taste that warms up your body. It tastes great in the coffee.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>......Karin-san, are you putting that in your coffee?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yup. I feel like adding a lot of beet sugar and milk today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Okay, then I’ll add some sugar and milk, too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I also feel like having some cake. Do you think I should order a slice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I guess it can’t be helped~ Since you’re already ordering more, I’ll get a citrus tart!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
